name: Flying Construction Truck Flying Simulator
description:
Flying Construction Truck Flying Simulator

Construction Truck Simulator : The life on a construction site is not easy. There are many objects to look out for. The rugged trucks,
The heavy loaders, mass transports all are part of the game.
Sit behind the excavator wheels and complete the assigned tasks. Build roads and fulfill all tasks at the city construction site.

Explore various parts of the cities and fulfill your contract as a construction truck driver.How you many levels can you clear?
Smooth steering, hydraulic excavator controls, first person off road driving and heavy machinery handling are the awesome features
that make off road construction truck simulator an amazing 3d game.

key features:

=> Real Experience of Driving Heavy Vehicles
=> Addictive Missions of Excavation, Transport & Road Construction
=> Smooth Steering, Hydraulic Brakes, Lifting and Rotation Controls
=> Real-time Physics for Driving Heavy Construction Vehicles
